mapper.insert: insert into log_user(id, operateUserId,className, methodName, methodParams, returnValue, costTime, operateTime) values (#{id}, #{operateUserId}, #{className}, #{methodName}, #{methodParams}, #{returnValue}, #{costTime}, #{operateTime})
mapper.delete: delete from log_user where operateTime < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
